archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.2b: b) avoiding all or part of the risk (e.g. by cancelling a high-risk project, changing the design of a system so that the risk is removed or reduced, or deciding not to pursue a particular business initiative)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
